import { Button } from '@mui/material' import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' import '../Details/UserList.css' export const UserList = () => { const contacts = useSelector((state) => state) const updateUser = ({name,type,description}) => { const data = { id: contacts.length > 0 ? contacts[contacts.length - 1].id + 1 : 0, name, type, description }; localStorage.setItem('name',name,(data)) localStorage.setItem('type',type(data)) localStorage.setItem('description',description(data)) } return (
{contacts.map((contact, id) => ( ))}
id Name Type Description Edit Delete
{id + 1} {contact.name} {contact.type} {contact.description}
{/* */}
) }
